### HealthCheck

 
Add this config to a Listener/Gateway to Enable Envoy Health Checks on that port

```yaml
"path": string

```

| Field | Type | Description |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- | 
| `path` | `string` | match health check requests using this exact path. |
